summary: Wealthy Brice Wayne enters West Point and, though he does well on the football field, angers fellow cadets with his arrogance. Disciplined by the coach he yells "To hell with the Corps!" ... See full summary Â»
cast: William Haines|Joan Crawford|William Bakewell|Neil Neely|Ralph Emerson|Leon Kellar|Raymond G. Moses|Edward Brophy|E.H. Calvert
keywords: army military school|cadet corps|football team|texan|smart aleck
title: El cadete de West Point
